name: practiced
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very good at doing something because you have a lot of experience at doing it: She is a confident and practiced speaker who always impresses her audience. He is practiced in the art of public debate. We need someone who is practiced at negotiating business deals.
formal A practiced skill has been obtained from a lot of practice: She performed the song with practiced skill.
